idea: Hey. I am Parth Doshi from mumbai. I am looking out to set up a business of my own.
name: Parth Doshi

idea:
Vision - To guide, counsel and handhold One million passionate seekers and youth by helping them identify their passion in the field of academics, performing arts or sports and achieve greater heights across the Globe to bring in prosperity to the nation.

Mission – HEALTHY WEALTHY GLOBE

MaxNyan Advisory Private Limited

Values – Passion, Dedication, Commitment, Authenticity

The Team of MaxNyan Advisory is highly experienced in diverse fields, viz. Academic, Sports and Cultural.

Academic Vertical of MaxNyan has guided and counselled more than 3,400+ students from Grade 8th to PG in various capacities to match up with their core strengths and capabilities. With a network of more than 450+ Universities in countries like USA, UK, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, Europe, Curacao, Singapore, we have been successfully arranging from Passport to Accommodation assistance for students till date. With Quality services, excellent support at affordable price with individual students getting admitted every year we also run Group Summer School Fellowship Programs for various streams in abroad, providing them with the exposure to the Project Based learning, Industrial Visits and Certification from the University & Industry.

Our experience in the field of career assessment made us realize that the roots are really deep and ensure comprehensive outlook and holistic development of the student and awareness about not only the various fields in the conventional streams like those of Engineering, MBBS, MBA, Hotel Management, but how, where and which way the students can fulfil their career aspirations in the field of Performing Arts, Sports and other fields as well.

Cultural Vertical of MaxNyan provides training and guidance in the field of Performing Arts through its various Workshops for different age groups. And our Phulpakharu Activity in the True sense is the mirror of Indian Culture for kids in age group 3 to 14 years.

Our Sports Vertical of MaxNyan is well equipped with the appropriate setup and infrastructure for the right kind of Fitness & Sports Training and identifying various Careers in Sports.

Mobile: 9820382117 / 9820383118 wecare@maxnyan.com www.maxnyan.com

Join our FB, Instagram & LinkedIn & Subscribe to our YouTube Channel – MaxNyan Advisory
name: MaxNyan Advisory Private Limited

idea: BODHE INSTITUTE FOR SKILL INNOVATION LLP is a gradually growing partnership started in the year 2021. A new age start-up for the employment, entrepreneurship and skill development sector, bringing best-in-class standard and practices to make youth of India building career of their own choices. Our vision is to impart innovative skills & transform masses into an extraordinary professionals contributing value to global business. Our startup is working towards creating expertise among youth to create professional opportunities for them.
name: BODHE INSTITUTE FOR SKILL INNOVATION LLP

idea: Translating Ideas & Imaginations Into Creative Audio-Visual Communication Experiences. We are a communication & experience design company. idea:
The company intends to reduce the low system availability issue due to lack of adequate maintenance and support infrastructure by providing a local customer support and maintenance service for existing advanced tactical products installed in field.


The Company intends to contribute to envisaged plan of Make in India/Aatmanirbhar Bharat through 3 key areas of operation:


1. Service provider for Advanced Tactical Systems:

2. In House Research & Development of Bullet proof armor

3. Co-development and distribution of software solutions:
name: NIKUNJ DEFENSE SYSTEMS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
https://thepd.group/


A brand without a marketing agency is like tea without biscuits. You might have the best product/service but if you don't know how to market it among your TG then what's the sense of having the best products. 

At PD Group, we come up with tailor-made solutions that will help your brand to grow & perform better. As we say, we don't talk the talk, we walk it too! 

Our Services include - Branding, Social Media, Photography, Copywriting, Website, AR Filters, Animation, Paid Marketing.

We've got you covered when it comes to creativity, concepts & over all marketing needs.
name: PD GROUP : Perceive Differently
